name: GetLastATT_Old
description: GetLastATT - AQL version that is buggy (10-12-2020)

steps.processorData:
select
    a/context/start_time/value as created,
    e/ehr_id/value as ehr_id,
    e/ehr_status/subject/external_ref/id/value as mrn,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0002]/items[at0006]/value/value as ReferralSource,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0002]/items[at0011]/value/value as SpecificySource,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0002]/items[at0012]/value/value as ArrivalLocation,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0002]/items[at0019]/value/value as RefferalDetailComment,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0003]/items[at0020]/value/value as Diagnosis,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0003]/items[at0021]/value/value as RequiresSideRoom,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0003]/items[at0024]/value/value as ReasonForSideRoom,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0003]/items[at0028]/value/value as OtherReasonForSideRoom,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0003]/items[at0029]/value/value as COVID,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0003]/items[at0032]/value/value as SeenByJnrDr,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0003]/items[at0033]/value/value as DTSeenByJnrDr,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0003]/items[at0034]/value/value as SeenByConDr,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0003]/items[at0035]/value/value as DTSeenByConDr,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0003]/items[at0036]/value/value as VTECompleted,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0003]/items[at0037]/value/value as TEPCompleted,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0004]/items[at0038]/value/value as ForITUHDU,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0004]/items[at0042]/value/value as ForResus,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0005]/items[at0046]/value/value as DischargeTransferDestination,
    a_a/data[at0001]/items[at0005]/items[at0047]/value/value as HideFromTracker
from EHR e contains
top 1
COMPOSITION a
contains EVALUATION a_a[openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.acute_take_tracker.v0]
order by created desc
offset 0 limit 1000000
